p: For the murine model, the A/H1N1/pdm09 influenza virus variant HA-D222-mpJena/5258, expressing an aspartate in position 222 of the viral hemagglutinin, was passaged on MDCK. HA-D222-mpJena/5258 was obtained after three plaque-purification steps [ 27] from the lung of BALB/c mice infected with the A/H1N1/pdm09 influenza virus isolate A/Jena/5258/09 (kindly provided by Andi Krumbholz [ 28].
